description: The peak is not too high, but the breathtaking view is sooo amazing!  An easy hike on Banff's smallest summit, offering 360 views of the town and Spray River.  A good one for the family, or a quick fix.
directions: Lower trailhead on St. Julien Road, near the Banff CentreUpper trailhead on Tunnel Mountain Drive (closed to vehicles in winter)
title: tunnel mountain
